name: LudumDare50
description:
[20220405]: Trying to get the itchio web embeded resolution right

Created for LudumDare 50 - Delay the inevitable

You are in charge of shelter where you are trying to keep your pets as long as you can. But it seems it is inevitable to sold them otherways your shelter will be ruined.

Quick tips for these who are lazy to read info in game:

  • you need to have all six spots with monster on the level of 12
  • if you will have negative score > end
  • click on plus icon to add monster
  • click on moster to selected it
  • press E to see info about monster
  • there are three phases for each monster:

    a) need phase

    • you have to satisfy need in bubble with satisfier from the satisfier stock
    • if you dont have satisfier, you can press S or rabbit icon to move to next need

    b) evaluation phase

    • your peace time
    • can be skipped by clicking on clock icon

    c) sell phase

    • you can sell your monster if it is too much for you
  • By pressing “E” you can see info about selected monster
